metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9255 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
The mp4ff_read_stsc function in common/mp4ff/mp4atom.c in Freeware AdvancedAudio Decoder 2 (FAAD2) 2.7 allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (large loop and CPU consumption) via a crafted mp4 file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9255` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

faad - 2.8.1-2
libfaad2 - 2.8.1-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: faad2 package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.8.1-2').
